website_summaries.verdict: A Spongebob Squarepants toy by a popular brand that has figures and components that encourage imaginative play.
pros: Adorable castle with a Krusty Krab theme
Comes with several accessories, including Plankton and Spongebob character figures
Has fun hidden compartments and moving parts
cons: A few parents felt that the toy had limited appeal, but young Spongebob fans are likely to disagree

customer_reviews.title: Son Loves It
customer_reviews.text: My son is a huge spongebob fan. I went nuts looking on auction sites for old playsets. I managed to get them all and found this larger set here in amazon. It's a castle in a sense. Bigger. It works as advertised and he loves it. We purchased extra sponge bob figurines and he goes into imaginative play for hours. With plankton stealing krabby patties and everything . Super cute. No complaints
customer_reviews.author: GemmaStone

customer_reviews.title: Okay Set
customer_reviews.text: Our boys love the Imaginext brand! They were super excited about this Spongebob set, but this one seemed a bit more simple than some of the others we’ve purchased in the past. I think you’re mostly paying for the Spongebob theme for this one.
customer_reviews.author: SarahMc

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift - Hours of Fun
customer_reviews.text: This toy is amazing. My 5 year old son loves it and plays with it for hours. The Spongebob and Plankton toys are the perfect size and are great in design. All of the toys function properly and it was made in a very solid design. My sons other Fisher Price & Play Skool action figures fit in the Krusty Krab toy house very well so he has even more use. Please come out with some more toys for this set like Patrick, Mr Krabs, Sandy, Squidward. That would just be the greatest!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hours of play, well made and perfect for spongebob fan!
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old who is obsessed with spongebob was over the moon to receive this as a birthday gift. It’s well made and shipped quickly. He’s had several hours of play with it and it’s just as perfect as the day we got it.
customer_reviews.author: Ms Creepy

customer_reviews.title: Who’s ready for crabby patties
customer_reviews.text: This is going to be hours of fun for me.....I mean my grandson. I have pulled on pieces and moving parts for durability before I give it to him and is really well made. Great purchase! Only wish it came with Me Crabs.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Thornock

customer_reviews.title: Krusty Krab!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this! It goes with his spongebob house I bought from imagenext. The only thing is the top piece that opens up is warped so it doesn’t close right but he still plays with it of course.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Not as fancy as of the other Imaginext sets but it has SPONGEBOB. Imaginext is a reliable and durable. We have bought many sets and very few of them have broken.
customer_reviews.author: naomi

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: Only took a star off because there are soooo many extra pieces and my kids have already lost all but spongebob. Otherwise my kids loved this and have had a lot of fun with it
customer_reviews.author: Jessica munoz

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: It was exactly as a described some hidden doors in the castle made it fun for my son but overall for some reason he doesn’t play with it much, maybe in some time he will
customer_reviews.author: Sergio  Interial

customer_reviews.title: Perfect birthday gift!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my sons birthday and I love it! Its a decent size and very cute! Can't wait for him to open it!
customer_reviews.author: KellysKozys

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I got this toy for a 3 year old. He loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: My neice love's it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my eight-year-old niece and she loves it! Was definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect for our little spongebob lover! She loves all the hidden features & the spatula launch!
customer_reviews.author: Brittaney

customer_reviews.title: Great for anyone who loves spongebob !
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a Christmas gift along with the krabby patty car and boat car. My kids love it! Most played with gift.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Best MoM ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what my son was hoping for, but actually much bigger. Great buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Notyourtypicallady

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: bought this for our nephew and it was his favorite gift this year!
customer_reviews.author: Kora B

customer_reviews.title: great gift for a 5 year old boy
customer_reviews.text: I was exactly as pictured, Very nice quality. He hasn't set it down once in 3 days. Even legos are not competition.
customer_reviews.author: Jkelso

customer_reviews.title: waste of money
customer_reviews.text: defective, parts do not work, my grandson played 10 minutes and now is collecting dust,
customer_reviews.author: natural

customer_reviews.title: Spongebob and the gang
customer_reviews.text: Such an entertaining toy with cute and funny figures included
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Kids love it. I also got the one that is spongebob and squidwards houses and they play for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Fc230

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loves
customer_reviews.text: Grandson loves this! It’s well made. And has great details! And the figures are spot on.
customer_reviews.author: James R. Hill

customer_reviews.title: Fun play set
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old grandson loves this toy. I’d recommend buying a set of characters, there are only a few that come with this play set.
customer_reviews.author: Jeri Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: Great value and price hard to find a toy like this
customer_reviews.author: Tony ❤️ Kayla Poopy

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good toy my son really likes it I thought it came incomplete but I was wrong I found the other parts later
customer_reviews.author: avega

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My little guys have a riot with this one. Spongebob is one of the only shows I can tolerate, so it makes it easy to play with them, because I watch it, too! Durable and fun.
customer_reviews.author: MommyWifeNurse

customer_reviews.title: Be gentle with it. Plastic stresses easily.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived new but with a few large stress marks on the plastic parts. It was OPENED UP inside the box so plastic parts were bent. I was able to fix it & make it work as it should. For half the price of eBay & being still in its factory packing... It's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Candice Conrad

customer_reviews.title: Its awesome!
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old loves this! Comes with three spatulas that you can shot from the roof. The secret formula in the bottle is perfect for playing! We just need more figurines to play with.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 5 year old boy, who is super into spongbob right now and he loves it!!!!! He tells me thank you all the time for buying it for him!.
customer_reviews.author: CASEY PEACOCK

customer_reviews.title: Packaging sucked but everything was there
customer_reviews.text: Packaging sucked. Wanted to surprise my baby with this. Figured it’d have the original packaging but no.. it was a normal cardboard box
customer_reviews.author: Margie Alanis

customer_reviews.title: My boy loves it.
customer_reviews.text: In great condition upon arrival. Very durable. My boy is super rough with it and it doesn’t damage easily. Easy to play with.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great toy!!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loved this. He played with it over the weekend and it kept his interest with all the moving parts.. He is 2 1/2 years old.
customer_reviews.author: Freda B

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Our son loves this set!!! It’s a decent size and well worth the money. Comes with characters and pieces to play with. Great buy for sure!!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Denton

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Quality toy for any fan of SpongeBob and the Krusty Krab. Reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: Lucinda Roese

customer_reviews.title: Just as expected. Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: My two sons loved their new crusty crab toy. Its very nice quality. The toy and accessories it came with are very nice original.
customer_reviews.author: Sengy Alanis

customer_reviews.title: Great toy set!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my son for Christmas and he absolutely loved it he is obsessed with spongebob!
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Bullock

product_meta.title: Fisher-Price Imaginext Spongebob Krusty Krab Kastle [Amazon Exclusive]
product_meta.description: Style:Krusty Krab Kastle​How far will SpongeBob SquarePants go to protect the Krabby Patty formula? With this awesome Imaginext playset, kids can transform the Krusty Krab restaurant into the Krusty Krab Kastle, complete with a trap door, secret passageway, a safe to hold the secret recipe, a jail cell and spatula cannon. Kids will love cooking up their own endings to this story, deciding who will be king of the castle this time. Imaginext Imagine What’s Next!
feature_bullets: Krusty Krab Kastle playset arrives in packaging that reveals what's inside. To keep it a secret, select "Ship in Amazon packaging" at checkout.
Krusty Krab restaurant transforms into a castle with a trap door, jail cell, and secret passages
​Turn Power Pad to move spatula launcher from side to side; press to fire!
Comes with SpongeBob and Plankton figures, 2 Krabby Patties, 3 spatula projectiles, table with chairs, net accessory, and Krabby Patty formula bottle

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars394 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
